fields.body:
This is a small django project that aims to allow developers *(and - someday - maybe average users)* to easily create a basic website and get to work on the more interest parts of web-based website/application development. Some key features that come *"out-of-the-box"* with this system are:

* User accounts with Django's flexible user permission systems
* Dynamically generated navigation system that uses permissions to decide who sees which menu items
* News / blogging support (as you can see) which supports:
    * Blog and news post with permission-based multi-user support
    * Markup generation based on popular markup formats (Textile, RestructuredText, Markdown)
    * Dynamic, automatic RSS / ATOM feed generation
fields.title: Django content manager
